item.title: Markdown 代码块语言声明列表
item.author: admin@axiaoxin.com (axiaoxin)
item.description: 语言名称 Markdown 语言声明 常见文件名 1C Enterprise 1c-enterprise *.bsl 4D 4d *.4dm ABAP abap *.abap ABNF abnf *.abnf AGS Script ags-script, ags *.asc AMPL ampl *.ampl ANTLR antlr *.g4 API Blueprint api-blueprint *.apib APL apl *.apl ASN.1 asn.1 *.asn ASP asp, aspx, aspx-vb *.asp ATS ats, ats2 *.dats ActionScript actionscript, actionscript3, as3 *.as Ada ada, ada95, ada2005 *.adb Adobe Font Metrics
